title: Ticket #7580: condor_store_cred -f will segfault if -p not included
description:
THIS BUG NEVER MADE IT INTO A RELEASE

After refactoring the options struct pw is now a pointer and not an array and thus can be NULL, leading to a segfault. Easy fix.
remarks:
2020-Apr-10 07:46:37 by tim:
Bulk change of target version from v080906 to v080907 using ticket-target-mover.

2020-Apr-21 14:18:46 by johnkn:
CODE_REVIEW change looks good. and as this bug was never released, I'm resolving it without version history.
check_ins: 2020-Apr-03 14:07   Check-in [59240]: Check for NULL value of pointer pw. #7580 (By zmiller )
creator: zmiller
